channel.title: Comiler Help! ( Need Help Please )
channel.description:
Ok well im starting a new server. Im not great at coding but yet im not the worst. When I go to compile the server a list comes up C for compile and R for run when i type C the compiler sayds i dont have the rigth java updates which should be Java 6.0 Update2? and when i type R an error comes up saying.
"Error : Unable to startup Listener on 43594 - port already in use?"

item.title: Comiler Help! ( Need Help Please )
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Hmm… Well go into your compiler by clicking “Edit” and search for this

C:\Program files\Java\

And you should see this

C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe

And just change the jdk1.6.0_02 to the jdk you have, if you wanna see which one you have, just go into My Computer->C:->Program Files->Java and replace jdk1.6.0_02 to the name of the jdk folder in Java. (example: jdk1.5.0_01)
Hope I helped!

Read full topic

item.description:
@x_pked_x wrote:

Yankee, i have the same problem as you have, could you please tell me wich Java you downloaded, as i am stuck at where you were :o, Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Comiler Help! ( Need Help Please )
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Ok, just go to no-ip.com, register and add a host with the no-ip address you want for the server, then for IP, put either your Ham IP, or if you’re not using Hamachi, just put you’re computer’s IP, by going to whatismyip.com.

Read full topic

item.title: Comiler Help! ( Need Help Please )
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

1.close mopar client
2.close compiler
3.re-run compiler
3.run compiler again and run server
4.open mopar client
5.put in username and pass and play
=D

Read full topic
